void getLeftRightCameras ( int  cam,
int &  camLeft,
int &  camRight 
)

Get the neighbouring left and right camera indices of a specified camera. Only the 5 ring-arranged cameras are considered.

Parameters
intindex of the camera
int&output index of the left neighbouring camera
int&output index of the right neighbouring camera

void
